The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 August is 285,505 (507.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 23 August, there were 6,693 new confirmed cases (11.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 August, there were 6,872 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 3% (179 fewer cases).
